Notes for Users of this document: Coding is more Phonetic in Baraha. Special care – Baraha coding uses ‘e’ and ‘o’ 
(in Sanskrit) for sound E and O. we have used capital letters as it matches with Unicode/general conventions in this document. ~g is nasal of ka varga (gna) ~j is nasal of cha varga (jya) H is visargam Vedic/Swara symbols – q anudAttam, # swaritam, 
$ dheerga swaritam, & avagraha,  ~M nasal symbol ushmAn codes s, S, Sha (saraswati, Sankar, puShpam) Confirm corrections given in TS 1.8 Sanskrit Pada Paatam are incorporated. Kindly notify any major errors or inadvertent deletions to mail id- vedavms@gmail.com OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH,
